alert.note: Alert for Okanogan Highlands (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 5:45PM PDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Ferry and northeastern Okanogan Counties through 615 PM PDT... At 544 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 13 miles southeast of Oroville, or 34 miles northeast of Omak, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Sitzmark Hill, Lost Lake Campground, Molson, Chesaw and Havillah. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
